name: How-to Demo - Setting up Email Automation
description: Tutorial video showing users how to set up email automation workflows

requirements.audience: Marketing professionals and small business owners new to email automation
requirements.cta: Start your free trial and automate your first email sequence today
requirements.main_problem: Business owners manually send repetitive emails and miss follow-up opportunities, losing potential customers

type2_requirements.core_interaction_steps: 1. Navigate to Automation tab 2. Click 'Create New Workflow' 3. Choose trigger (new subscriber) 4. Add welcome email template 5. Set delay timing 6. Add follow-up emails 7. Test the sequence 8. Activate automation
type2_requirements.where_people_make_mistakes: Users often forget to test their automation before activating, leading to broken sequences. They also commonly set delays too short or too long, and forget to segment their audience properly.
